scripts.install:all: npm install && npm install --prefix shared && npm install --prefix backend --legacy-peer-deps && npm install --prefix frontend --legacy-peer-deps
scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev --prefix backend" "npm run dev --prefix frontend"
scripts.build: npm run install:all && npm run build --prefix shared && cd backend && npm run prisma:generate && npx prisma migrate deploy && npm run build && cd ../frontend && npm run build
